title: Prime Arrangements - Math - Easy - LeetCode
content:
Return the number of permutations of 1 to n so that prime numbers are at prime indices (1-indexed.)

content:

title: DI String Match - Math - Easy - LeetCode
content:

title: Smallest Range I - Math - Easy - LeetCode
content:
